R Markdown site generator for Distill websites

Source: R/distill_website.R
distill_website.Rd

R Markdown site generator for Distill websites

distill_website(input, encoding = getOption("encoding"), ...)

Arguments

input

Website directory (or the name of a file within the directory).
encoding

Ignored. The encoding is always assumed to be UTF-8.
...

Currently unused.

Contents

distill is a part of rmarkdown.io, an ecosystem of packages for creating computational documents in R. Learn more at rmarkdown.io.

Developed by JJ Allaire, Rich Iannone, Yihui Xie. Site built with pkgdown.
